text: Soraya Esfandiary-Bakhtiary (; 22 June 1932 â€“ 26 October 2001) was the queen consort of Iran as the second wife of Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, whom she married in 1951. Soraya died on 26 October 2001 in her apartment in Paris, France; she was 69. ==References== * Category:1932 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Kings and Queens consort Category:Iranian actors
title: Soraya Esfandiary-Bakhtiary
